column1: #       Southern Poverty Law Center's list of hate groups.
# - Lines beginning with ? are groups/domains that are not in the list
# - Lines beginning with + are newly added groups in the list.
# - Lines beginning with x are domains which no longer exist (nx)
# - Lines beginning with d are domains which still exist, but are non-functional
